instructions.welcome: Welcome to Shape Lab! Let's discover area and perimeter through hands-on building! 🏗️

perimeter.title: Exercise: Trace the Perimeter
perimeter.instruction: Click squares to build a shape with the target perimeter. Remember: perimeter is the total length of the outer edge!
perimeter.tip: 💡 Tip: Perimeter = outer edge length. Try different shapes!

area.title: Exercise: What's the Area?
area.instruction: How many squares fit inside this orange shape? Click each square to count!
area.tip: 💡 Tip: Area = number of squares that fit inside

pattern.title: Pattern Builder
pattern.instruction: Complete the pattern by selecting the correct next shape
pattern.error: ❌ Try again! Look for the pattern!

tank.title: 🧃 Fill the Tank — L ↔ mL
tank.instruction: Choose the correct volume to fill the tank

mental_math.title: ⚡ Mental Estimation
mental_math.instruction: Think quickly! Use your mental math skills!
